definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

pinyin: jin4 ju4 li2 wu2 xian4 tong1 xun4

sentences.english: It stands apart with small creatures near its roots.
sentences.chinese: 它站在这里，与树下的小动物保持着距离。

sentences.english: For starters, it's being held in the gymnasium at Valley High School, a few miles from the Strip.
sentences.chinese: 训练在山谷高中已经有一阵子，距离繁华区有几英里。

sentences.english: We hope to shorten the distance after Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在星期六之后能缩短距离。

sentences.english: It' near Guzhen Park and about 300 meters away from my shop.
sentences.chinese: 门市接近古镇公园，离我门市大年夜约300米距离。

sentences.english: A good reference is number of rotations from the point of release to the arrows.
sentences.chinese: 从离手后到目标箭头的长度是段不错的参考距离。

sentences.english: Are you aware that many researchers are convinced that prolonged close work causes myopia?
sentences.chinese: 你认为，许多研究员确信长期近距离工作引起近视吗？

sentences.english: The planet Jupiter blazes near the waxing gibbous moon tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚光辉四溢的木星和月亮拉近了距离。

sentences.english: Remember that rho is the distance from the origin.
The center of this groove is also half-way from the ceiling to the floor of the Grand Gallery.
sentences.chinese: 这些槽的中央也是从走廊的天花板都地面距离的一半。

sentences.english: The school is three miles distant from the station.
Space project motion is right now apropos 20 hours.
sentences.chinese: 此时距离项目动议恰好20个小时。

sentences.english: In this article, atom-pairs of compounds, which include abundant three-dimensional information of molecules, were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 采用原子对空间距离法表征化合物的三维结构信息。

sentences.english: Doing this will make my distance-based searches work.
sentences.chinese: 这样做会使我的基于距离的搜索起作用。

sentences.english: The number of wagging dances per minute told the exact distance to the feeding place.
sentences.chinese: 每分钟摆尾舞的次数表明了到喂食处的精确距离。

sentences.english: Crocodiles can move very quickly over short distances on land.
sentences.chinese: 在陆地上，巨鳄可以迅速奔跑一段距离。

definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
at a distance of/distance/to be apart
distance apart/separated by a given distance
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to be almost within reach/to be close at hand
